1190220.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rippers Resurrected Expedition: Amazon (SWADE)
1190220.description:
Rippers Resurrected Expedition: Amazon

Something ancient and evil calls from the heart of the Amazon.
The
Rippers must establish a new lodge to explore the vast rainforest and its massive rivers to defeat the malevolent forces that seek to exploit it.
Expedition: Amazon is the first in a series of supplements that take the war with the Cabal to the most incredible and inaccessible places on Earth. Each book contains background information, new gear, hazards, monsters, and a complete Plot Point Campaign. It's designed to be used with the Expeditions supplement.
Ready your rifle and mosquito net--we're heading deep into the dark jungle along the world's most powerful river.
To play, this book requires the Rippers Resurrected Player's Guide and the Rippers Resurrected Game Master's Handbook, as well as the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition core rules and the Rippers Conversion for Adventure Edition (#SWADE)
